author: brandiskip
body:
#### PR description:

In Validation/SiTrackerPhase2V, added code to create necessary histograms using extended collection so that we now have histograms for both prompt and displaced tracks. Moved all code related to stubs to Validation/SiTrackerPhase2V/plugins/Phase2OTValidateStub.cc and created Validation/SiTrackerPhase2V/plugins/Phase2OTHarvestStub.cc to keep all stub related code together and separate from L1Tracks code. Renamed necessary files to better describe what is being done in that particular code. Summary of histograms added for extended collection can be found [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1555122/contributions/6548463/attachments/3080726/5461274/DQM_Extended_Collection_Histograms.pdf).

Also included in this PR, code changes that ljuckett made to create histograms that include vectors for easier reading and remove redundancy.

In DQM/SiTrackerPhase2, fixed bug related to PS strip histogram, see slides 2 and 3 of this [talk](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1555122/contributions/6548463/attachments/3080726/5453258/DQMOfflineSoftwareMeeting_6_4_25.pdf).

#### PR validation:

scram build code-checks
scram build code-format
title: L1 Track Extended Collection for Phase2OT added to Validation Package
